title: Southampton Tech Day 1
desc: A chance to meet other competitors, the Student Robotics team, to get help and share ideas. You should have a mobile robot chassis and be developing your other mechanisms

title: Bristol Tech Day 1
desc: A chance to meet other competitors, the Student Robotics team, to get help and share ideas. You should have a mobile robot chassis and be developing your other mechanisms

title: Tech Day 2
desc: Another opportunity to meet up with the other competitors and mentors. Your robot should be nearly finished, and you should have started writing code to drive it

title: Competition Prep Day
desc: One mad last hack opportunity in the competition arena

title: Competition
desc: The culmination of all your hard work
